def_en: If something falters, it loses power or strength in an uneven way, or no longer makes much progress.

def_cn: (因不自信)畏缩不前，开始出错;犹疑
def_en: If you falter, you lose your confidence and stop doing something or start making mistakes.

def_cn: (说话)迟疑，吞吞吐吐，支吾
def_en: If your voice falters when you are speaking, you hesitate or pause, because you are unsure about what you are saying or are upset.
